department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Patrick Brooks is a writer and director, whose work has screened at Tribeca, Palm Springs ShortFest, Vancouver, Milano and Slamdance.  His recent short "The Boy Scout" won "Best Short Film" at the 2013 BendFilm Festival and also earned awards at the Palm Springs ShortFest and the Columbus Film + Video Festival.   In addition, Patrick is also an accomplished cinematographer of short and feature films.  He holds a M.F.A. in Film Production/ Directing from UCLA’s School of Theater, Film and Television
